    • Uses of Screen in screens.gameScreens

      Subclasses of Screen in screens.gameScreens 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConfirmQuit
      Creates a screen that confirms if user wants to quit or not, and if so, allows user to terminate program
      class  DeathMenu
      Displays a screen asking if user would like to restart game or quit the game if they die
      class  GameScreen
      Creates a screen that has the components of the playable game
      class  Pause
      Creates a screen that pauses the game and gives user the option to resume or restart the game
      class  Shop
      Creates a screen that allows user to upgrade their stats
      class  VictoryScreen 

    • Uses of Screen in screens.startScreens

      Subclasses of Screen in screens.startScreens 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChooseDifficulty
      Creates a screen that allows user to decide the difficulty of the game they would like to play
      class  ChooseHero
      Creates a screen that allows user to pick their hero
      class  Credits
      Creates a screen that lists the game's awesome creators
      class  Rules
      Creates a screen that displays the rules of the game
      class  Settings
      Creates a screen that has adjustable settings for sound, volume, and user-dependent keys
      class  StartScreen
      Creates a screen that is displayed at the start and allows user to either pick a hero, see the rules, see credits, or quit the program
